snippet.title: Hermit and Pig - Official Story Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Learn more about Hermit and Pig's adventure and their personalities in this latest trailer for Hermit and Pig, an upcoming turn-based RPG coming to PC. The new trailer gives us a look at the world, the story, and some of the characters as Hermit and Pig embark on a quest to help a nearby town. Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot.
